    I would recommend this for any kitchen. It is eye appealing and very durable. It is great for color coding in restaurants and the knife lasts a long time.

    Jean H. Posted on 01/19/2018

    I have so many of this company's knives. I love them so much! Super Super sharp, easy to clean and hone. Look and feel great and you can't beat the price! Get these knives, you wont be sorry!

    Matthew H. from Country Dog Posted on 01/15/2018

    I sought out a cheaper alternative to the Victorinox line for a low-budget cooking student. These fit the bill nicely; they seem to hold an edge okay and the bolster was comfortable to work with.

    Dana K. Posted on 12/31/2017

    Among the most versatile of chefs knives on the market, this knife holds its edge and sharpens quite well. It has been a valuable addition to our dairy kitchen. Would definitely recommend.

    Making potato chips. Wicked sharp out of the box edge.

    This knife has a really good grip . And it is really sharp and good for cutting hard things. Because it is sharp you have to be careful washing knifes like this

    I like that Eragon Damocles shaped handle and the Comfort fits of the handle. I've been using it for a while now and yet to see any tarnished spots.

    I like that the Mercer M22608BL Millennia 8" Chef Knife is available in a blue handle. The blue can be color coded to only be used on seafood.

    I love all the knives in the Mercer Millenia line. We color code our kitchen so the color options come in handy and save us from having to use spray paint or a label! This chef knife is nicely weighted and I love the handle grips.

    Molly R. Posted on 11/03/2016

    This Mercer Millennia 8 inch Chef Knife with Blue Handle is wonderful. It has stayed sharp and it is useful for many jobs in the kitchen.

    our prep LOES this new knife. color coated for easy use and safe food prep. have since bought another set, as the line kept taking the preps. love these!

    Jennifer F. from FTS Posted on 08/01/2016

    Perfect semi nice, chef knife. Not quite the cheapest thing available on the market, but it's a grade above. Mercer brand cutlery has always shown to last a long time. I hope this knife will too.

    Daniel S. Posted on 07/06/2016

    Love Love Love this knife. Weight balance is good. Comfortable grip handle and very sharp. Nice 8 inch for all task in our restaurant. We will by buying more Mercer knives.

    Russell H. from Russ' Sub Shack Posted on 05/02/2016

    This is a great knife for the price! I was using a sharpening service for 25 years and finally decided to buy my own knives. This is a better knife than what they were bringing me and I pay once and it's mine. I highly recommend this knife! I even bought 2 more.

    World's sharpest kitchen knife ever. I will always have one of these in my kitchen. Thank you WEBstaurant Store for the quality of this listing.

    I really like this knife. It is the perfect size for pretty much any task and the handle is very sturdy and comfortable to use. The knife itself is sharp and of good quality.

    Samantha B. from Louami's Posted on 11/11/2015

    Good solid and comfortable handle. Durable and easy to sharpen with the steel. We were also able to get different color handles for the different sides of our Kosher kitchen so that is always a plus!

    Rachael W. from Pearlstone Center Posted on 08/27/2015

    Great Construction! Weight is perfect for use in the kicthen, durible yet lightweight and easy to handle. Pricing is perfect for the item requested. PERFECT!

    Tracy H. Posted on 05/21/2015

    I like the color choices I have. it helps with having the prep crews take care of there own knives If i see them laying around or just dropped in the dish room I know who it belongs to.

    Don R. from youth with a mission Posted on 03/23/2015

    VERY good knife at any price. The handle is strong and the overall weight is light, yet balanced nicely. It holds an edge and is thin enough to cut tomatoes.

    Karen B. from Gilpin Market Posted on 11/03/2014

    Definitely a must buy! stays sharp for a long time, easy to use and different colored handle to use on only certain foods. I will be purchasing many more, and different colors soon.

    Mike B. Posted on 06/08/2014

    These are some of the best knifes we have ever used, and the price is perfect for beginning chefs. We have tons of knife in our shop, these totally stand out. I Have personally bought the entire set for both work and personal use, and plan on buying more.

    DJ R. from Service On Call LLC Posted on 04/04/2014

    Jim M. from Magnolia Greens Golf Plantation Posted on 11/24/2013

    Fantastic knife! It's hard to find a good knife that holds a sharp edge, and even harder to find one comfortable enough that you want to use it all the time. I grab this knife over any of my knives that cost 5x as much because it's just a joy to use and so easy to control.

    Gregory C. Posted on 11/12/2013

    These are great basic knives. Handles are easy to grip and stay firm in your hand, even when wet. The blades sharpen easily and hold an edge fairly well.
